title: Лорд. Пёс-полицейский
overview: German shepherd Lord, proudly bearing the title of "police dog", a true legend of the homicide Department. This is an incredibly smart, clever and a good dog. And thanks to his unique sense of smell, intelligence and instant reaction, he deftly catches up with criminals, finds drugs and hears the silent footsteps of the attacker. Often it is the Lord manages to catch the details that eventually lead to solving crimes...
